name: The Dicenomicon TV
description:
Roll virtual dice all over your TV with The Dicenomicon + 1 for tvOS.
- Common dice types used for role playing games (d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, d12, d%)
- Many uncommon dice types (including support for Fudge/Fate Core games)
- Can be controlled via The Dicenomicon + 1 for iOS (sold separately), allowing everyone at the gaming table to be able to make shared rolls without knocking over minis
- Multiple backgrounds for the perfect game room fit
- Includes multiple dice color and configurable dice materials
